biotools.summary: Interactive software package for PCR primer design. PRISE enables the design of sequence-specific / sequence-selective PCR primers. One important feature of PRISE is that it automates the task of placing primer-template mismatches at the 3′ end of the primers – a property that is crucial for sequence selectivity / specificity.

bioschemas.name: PRISE
